page.title: 10A SCHOOL DAY IN GRAYS
page.content: On Monday morning I wake up at 7.30 am. I get dressed and go down and have my breakfast. I have cereals and toast. After, I have a wash and clean my teeth then brush my hair. At 8.30 I leave for school and take my little brother to school. I reach the school gates about 8.45; the bell rings at 8.55. In class, Mr. Lyall, my teacher, calls the register. At 9.15 the bell goes for Assembly. Mr. Newman reads us a story and we sing a song then we have a prayer. Back in class we do Maths until playtime at 10.30. We have 15 minutes break. Dinner time is at 12.00. A dinner lady shows us to a table and we eat our lunch. When we go out to play I play French Skipping. In the afternoon we have games or P.E. or Topic work. We go home at 3.15.
